snippet: The software pioneer John McAfee, a canny manipulator of the press, teased many a reporter to his Central American lairs only to spin tales that were surreal and often unverifiable.
abstract: The software pioneer John McAfee, a canny manipulator of the press, teased many a reporter to his Central American lairs only to spin tales that were surreal and often unverifiable.
lead_paragraph: The software pioneer John McAfee, a canny manipulator of the press, teased many a reporter to his Central American lairs only to spin tales that were surreal and often unverifiable, Jeff Wise reports. Read more »

headline.main: In Pursuit of McAfee, Media Are Part of Story
